channel.title: Please help problem with moparscape!
channel.description:
Ok, so a while ago i used to use moparscape and run servers with my friends, now when i open moparscape from my desktop it closes instantly, any suggestions?
edit: when i try to use the webclient it gives me this error ---
java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassFormatError: Incompatible magic value 1011373133 in class file AppletBot

item.title: Please help problem with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

Then you need to update your java. or set the path.

Read full topic

i didnt need to extract it, and coding? all i did was download moparscape 3.2, but when i click it the red bar appears with loading but it just closes afterwards

@BlacknRaven wrote:

Did you extract the client maybe and maybe u coded somthing wrong and messed up idk but id say redownload client and extract it and then ya have fun.
